verse.name: v1
verse.lines: 1- Lord, the light of your love is shining newline in the midst of the darkness shining newline Jesus, light of the world, shine upon us newline set us free by the truth you now bring us newline Shine on me, shine on me

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines: Shine, Jesus shine newline fill this land with the Father's glory newline Blaze, Spirit blaze set our hearts on fire newline Flow, river flow flood the nations with grace and mercy newline send forth your word Lord,and let there be light

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines: 2- Lord I come to your awesome presence newline From the shadows into your radiance newline by the blood I may enter your brightness newline search me, try me, consume all my darkness newline Shine on me, shine on me

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines: 3- As we gaze on your kingly brightness newline so our faces display your likeness newline ever changing from glory to glory newline mirrored here may our lives tell your story newline Shine on me, shine on me
